Fishing Times informs you about the best time to go fishing in your area. The times are calculated based on your location, the solunar fishing theory and the ancient Maori fishing calendar.

We're using a unique Solunar Clock graphic to display our fishing times. It's a 24 hour clock with indicators for fishing times, sun and moon times, moon phase, tide times (if available for your location).

This app is based on our popular fishing times at https://www.fishingreminder.com


How to read the Solunar Clock:

Green Bars indicate major and minor fishing times.
Major times = best times, Minor = second best

Blue Bars indicate low and high tide times.

Centre indicates current moon phase

Grey line represents the current time

the fish bubbles indicate the current day rating (1-4)

==Features==

The app combines highly accurate weather forecast for your location with a 3D map showing development of weather in a broader area in a very interesting way. This allows you to see where precipitation is going to come from or where the wind is blowing from. The uniqueness of the app comes from the amount of data displayed. Forecast of weather, precipitation, wind, cloud cover, atmospheric pressure, snow cover and other meteorological data for different altitudes is available for the whole world. 

WIND ANIMATION
The Ventusky application solves weather displaying in an interesting way. Wind is displayed using streamlines which clearly portray the continuous development of weather. Airflow on Earth is always in motion and the streamlines depict this motion in an amazing way. This makes the interconnection of all atmospheric phenomena obvious.

WEATHER FORECAST
Weather forecast for the first three days is available in the app in one-hour steps. For other days, it’s available in three-hour steps. Users can also look up sunrise and sunrise times in a given place or air quality.

WEATHER MODELS
Thanks to the Ventusky application, visitors get data directly from the numerical models that, just a few years ago, were used solely by meteorologists. The app collects data from the most accurate numerical models. Besides the well-known data from the American GFS and HRRR models, it also displays data from the Canadian GEM model and the German ICON model, which is unique thanks to its high resolution for the whole world. Two models, EURAD and USRAD, are based on current radar and satellite readings. These models are able to show precisely current precipitation in US and Europe.

WEATHER FRONTS
You can also display weather fronts. We have created a neural network that predicts the positions of cold, warm, occluded, and stationary fronts based on data from weather models. This algorithm is unique, and we are the first on the world who makes global fronts forecast available to users.

LIST OF WEATHER LAYERS
• Temperature (16 levels)
• Temperature anomaly
• Perceived temperature
• Precipitation (1 hour, 3 hour, long time accumulation)
• Radar
• Satellite
• Wind gusts (1 hour, long time maximum)
• Air quality (AQI, NO2, SO2, PM10, PM2.5, O3, dust or CO)
• Probability of aurora

LIST OF WEATHER LAYERS (PREMIUM)
• Wind (16 levels)
• Cloud cover (high, middle, low, total)
• Snow cover (total, new)
• Humidity (4 layers)
• Dew point
• Air pressure
• CAPE, CIN, LI, Helicity (SRH)
• Freezing level
• Wave forecast
• Ocean currents

LIST OF WEATHER WIDGETS
• Forecast 4x2
• Forecast 2x2
• Forecast 4x4
• Radar 4x2
• Radar 2x2

It has a cute little character, who has the sense of style. The character dresses according to the weather. In such a way the app shows you what to wear now, today, tonight, and tomorrow. Also, if it’s sunny, the character will put on sunglasses; if it’s rainy — will take an umbrella; if the air isn’t clean enough — an anti-pollution mask. 

Uniquely personalized experience.
What’s even better is that the avatar is customizable. You can choose its sex, skin tone, haircut, color of hair and eyebrows, glasses, beard and its color. Make it look like yourself or a person you would like to see every day.

Imaginative and diverse.
There is a nice landscape behind the character, and it is used to display the current or future weather. The landscape changes according to weather conditions, time of day, and season. It’s both a weather forecast and art — beautiful and precise.   

Forecast that you can trust.
We use a reliable weather source, which implements a scientific approach to predicting weather and not a random numbers generator :)  

Intuitive and slick user experience.
The interface is simple and straight to the point: hourly forecast, current conditions, and daily forecast at a glance. All you need to know is on the screen. 

A bunch of neat additional stuff: 
• Widget for quick access
• Light and smooth dark themes
• Warnings about naughty and dangerous weather 
• Air pollution levels 

And it’s all for free!

We have some paid content, but it’s dirty cheap and follows a monthly or yearly subscription model.
 
A bundle of pleasantries: 
• No ads
• Free 3-days trial
• View the character directly in the widget 

Even more customization.
Clothes selection for a character so it better reflects the style that you prefer.
 
An epic set of a weather oracle. 
If you are into detailed weather forecasts, we’ve got you covered! The app has weather maps and radar, which show the movement of air masses, clouds, and storms. Also, it has temperature, wind, humidity, and other maps. Basically, it has everything you need to feel like a weather oracle.  

Our love and gratitude. 
You help us grow, and it’s difficult to describe how much we appreciate it. 

No more frustrating and mood-killing clothing considerations, no more raw, boring data. Get the app, shoot a glance at the screen, and go on with enjoying your days in comfy clothes without getting cold, hot, or wet. 

Try it for yourself.
